Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN HttpAuthProvider::AuthorizeUser (  const String &  username  )  [virtual]
 

Method for authorizing a certain user. Must be implemented in derived classes. Default implementation returns FALSE.

Parameters:
username Name of a certain user to authorize.
Returns:
Whether the user s authorized or not.

Implements AuthProvider.

const String &  password
)  [virtual]
 

Method for authorizing a certain user with a certain password. Must be implemented in derived classes. Default implementation returns FALSE.

Parameters:
username Name of a certain user to authorize.
password Password for a certain user account.
Returns:
Whether the user s authorized or not.

Implements AuthProvider.

BOOLEAN HttpAuthProvider::IsAccessGranted (  const String &  username,
const Path &  path
)  [virtual]
 

Returns whether a certain user is allowed to access the specified path. Default implementation returns TRUE.

Parameters:
username Name of a certain user to authorize.
pathname Path name to check.
Returns:
Whether the user is granted access to the given path or not.

Implements AuthProvider.
